application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p style=""><span style="font-size:11pt;">The proposal for reasons of its excessive massing, scale, height and design and its location within the Green Belt on&nbsp;the edge of a&nbsp;a Site of Importance for Nature Conservation and in close proximity to residential dwellings,&nbsp;will be a visually discordant and obtrusive feature in the street scene that will harm the character and appearance of the area.&nbsp; The proposal is therefore contrary to:</span><br></p><p style=""></p><ul><li style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0cm 25.1pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">Paragraphs 114, 116, 126, 130, and 134 National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (MHCLG, July 2021);</span><o:p></o:p></li><li style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0cm 25.1pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">Policies&nbsp;D4, D8, and SI 6 of the London Plan (March 2021);</span><o:p></o:p></li><li style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0cm 25.1pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">Policy CP3 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);</span><o:p></o:p></li><li style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0cm 25.1pt; background-clip: initial;">Policies BP11 and&nbsp;BC12 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011);</span></li><li style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0cm 25.1pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">Policies SP2, DMD 1, and&nbsp;DMSI 9&nbsp;of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenhamâ€™s Draft Local Plan 2037 (Autumn 2021).</span></li></ul>
description:
Application for prior approval telecommunication: Proposed installation of a 20m high lattice tower to support 6No. antenna apertures and 4No. 600mm diameter transmission dishes, along with 6No.
equipment cabinets and development ancillary
